name: rhubarb-pi
description: A collection of extensions for Pi coding agent
author: Dave

scripts.install:all-extensions: npm run install:background-notify && npm run install:session-emoji && npm run install:session-color && npm run install:safe-git && npm run install:safe-rm && npm run install:pi-agent-scip
scripts.install:background-notify: npm run build:background-notify && cd hooks/background-notify && npm run install:global
scripts.install:safe-git: npm run build:safe-git && cd extensions/safe-git && npm run install:global
scripts.uninstall:all-extensions: npm run uninstall:background-notify && npm run uninstall:session-emoji && npm run uninstall:session-color && npm run uninstall:safe-git && npm run uninstall:safe-rm && npm run uninstall:pi-agent-scip
scripts.docs:check: rg 'pi-hooks|dave-pi-hooks' . --glob='!node_modules/**' --glob='!.git/**' && echo '⚠ Found outdated naming references' || echo '✓ No outdated references'
scripts.build: npm run build:background-notify && npm run build:safe-git
